Refer to Adjusted Body Weight Calculator to calculate ideal and dosing weight. For children with Body Mass Index greater than 30% adjusted body weight dosing is recommended  -For children less than 152 cm, the recommended dose is half way between ideal body weight and the actual body weight  -For children equal to or greater than 152 cm, use the Provincial Blood Coordinating Office (PBCO) Adjusted Weight Calculator
For patients with renal dysfunction or risk of renal dysfunction limit maximum rate to 0.2 g/kg/h
